name: unmedicated
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not having received medicine of some kind: Unmedicated patients are more likely to react with violence. She's HIV-positive but has been unmedicated and healthy for over 15 years.
not containing a medical substance: Make sure you use unmedicated body lotion as that is less likely to irritate your skin. Unless you have dandruff or another scalp condition, I recommend that you use an unmedicated shampoo.
More examplesFewer examplesThe effects were significantly less pronounced in the unmedicated group than in the medicated one.The results were compared with those from teenagers with OCD who were unmedicated.The control group of fish was fed unmedicated pellets.
